page.title: 03Our School
page.content: There are three classrooms. Mrs. Hawkins and Mrs. Wallace are in mobiles and the Headmistress, Mrs. Hubbard, in the main building. A part -time teacher, Mrs. Burton, teaches the top class on Friday and coaches football. There are 67 children in school who come from the Langtons, (Church,East,West,Tur,Thorpe),Slawston ,Glooston,Goadby,Welham,Nosely,Cranoe, Stonton Wyville,Carlton Curlieu,Three Gates and Shangton. In Class 1 we have 2 hamsters and a budgerigar. We have a playground, field and library. The hall is where we have dinner and do P. E. Each class has 2 blackboards and last year we got a computer. We have a secretary,caretaker and cook. All the children stay to dinner,looked after by 2 dinner ladies. Parents come into school to help with cooking,sewing and reading.
